summary: A story of Hong Kong told by three generations of real people: 'preschooled' children, 'preoccupied' young people, and 'preposterous' senior citizens.
cast: Alex Bedwell|Jason Cheung|Selene Cheung|Thierry Chow|Pui Kit Chung|Chi-Kui Fong|Ping Yuk Fong|South Ho|Kevin Lau|Winnie Lau|Ching Man Lip|Miso|Hariyani Phaynie|Kevin Sherlock|Sherin Siew|Wong Ho Sing|Quincy Su|Sanus Su|Yuk Ying Tam|Wun To|Mayson Tong|Charlie Wong|Vodka Wong|Connie Yuen|Shandong Zhang
title: Hoeng gong saam bou kuk
